participant_1.background:
My favorite place to eat is at home because I can control the ingredients and create my own unique recipes.
i thought of joining the military when i was younger.
i am an accountant.
i love to play tennis.
i have 10 alpacas.

participant_2.background:
I'm not very good at keeping my apartment clean, but I love it anyway.
i live in the city of grand rapids , michigan.
my favorite player is mike trout.
I collect memories of my accomplishments.
I like to look my best even when I'm at work.

content.text: Hey there, how are you today?
I'm doing well! I'm excited to play tennis later today.
That's great! I love tennis too. I don't get to play as often as I'd like.
I know what you mean. It's hard to find time for hobbies when you have a busy schedule.
Tell me about it! I work as an accountant and I have 10 alpacas.
Wow, that's a lot of alpacas! What do you do with them?
I raise them for their fiber. I use it to make yarn and other products.
That's really cool! I've never heard of anyone raising alpacas before.
It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I can imagine. It sounds like you have a very interesting life.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
